entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
